attributes.action: Stop the emergency use of bee-harming pesticide.
attributes.additional_details: Honey bees have long been reported to be critical to the eco-system, essential for all life. The survival of honey bees has been in danger for a long time with evidence of severe decline in numbers. Use of a pesticide that has been researched and deemed unsafe/fatal to honey bees should never be allowed.
attributes.background: As reported by BBC news 22/01/2021, stop emergency use of the pesticide that is expected to have a severe consequence to the honey bee population.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214
